00027 // GENERAL CONSTRUCTOR
00028 
00046 
00047 InputTargetDataSet::InputTargetDataSet
00048 (int newNumberOfSamples, int newNumberOfInputVariables, int newNumberOfTargetVariables)
00049 {
00050    // Number of samples 
00051 
00052    numberOfSamples = newNumberOfSamples;
00053 
00054    // Number of input and target variables
00055 
00056    numberOfInputVariables = newNumberOfInputVariables;
00057    numberOfTargetVariables = newNumberOfTargetVariables;
00058 
00059    // Name of input variables
00060 
00061    nameOfInputVariables.resize(numberOfInputVariables);
00062 
00063    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfInputVariables; i++)
00064    {
00065       std::stringstream buffer;
00066   
00067       buffer << "InputVariable" << i;
00068 
00069       nameOfInputVariables[i] = buffer.str();
00070    }
00071 
00072    // Name of target variables
00073 
00074    nameOfTargetVariables.resize(numberOfTargetVariables);
00075 
00076    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfTargetVariables; i++)
00077    {
00078       std::stringstream buffer;
00079   
00080       buffer << "TargetVariable" << i;
00081 
00082       nameOfTargetVariables[i] = buffer.str();
00083    }
00084 
00085    // Units of input variables
00086 
00087    unitsOfInputVariables.resize(numberOfInputVariables);
00088 
00089    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfInputVariables; i++)
00090    {
00091       unitsOfInputVariables[i] = "None";
00092    }
00093 
00094    // Units of target variables
00095 
00096    unitsOfTargetVariables.resize(numberOfTargetVariables);
00097 
00098    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfTargetVariables; i++)
00099    {
00100       unitsOfTargetVariables[i] = "None";
00101    }
00102 
00103    // Description of input variables
00104 
00105    descriptionOfInputVariables.resize(numberOfInputVariables);
00106 
00107    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfInputVariables; i++)
00108    {
00109       descriptionOfInputVariables[i] = "None";
00110    }
00111 
00112    // Description of target variables
00113 
00114    descriptionOfTargetVariables.resize(numberOfTargetVariables);
00115 
00116    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfTargetVariables; i++)
00117    {
00118       descriptionOfTargetVariables[i] = "None";
00119    }
00120 
00121    // Input data 
00122 
00123    inputData.resize(numberOfSamples, numberOfInputVariables);
00124 
00125    // Target data 
00126 
00127    targetData.resize(numberOfSamples, numberOfTargetVariables);
00128     
00129    // Display
00130 
00131    display = true;
00132 }

00218 // Matrix<double> getInputAndTargetData(void) method
00219 
00222 
00223 Matrix<double> InputTargetDataSet::getInputAndTargetData(void)
00224 {
00225    int numberOfVariables = numberOfInputVariables + numberOfTargetVariables;
00226 
00227    Matrix<double> inputAndTargetData(numberOfSamples, numberOfVariables, 0.0);
00228 
00229    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfSamples; i++)
00230    {
00231       for(int j = 0; j < numberOfInputVariables; j++)
00232       {
00233         inputAndTargetData[i][j] = inputData[i][j];
00234       }
00235 
00236       for(int j = 0; j < numberOfTargetVariables; j++)
00237       {
00238         inputAndTargetData[i][numberOfInputVariables+j] = targetData[i][j];
00239       }
00240    }
00241 
00242    return(inputAndTargetData);   
00243 }

00246 // Vector<double> getSample(int) method
00247 
00252 
00253 Vector<double> InputTargetDataSet::getSample(int i)
00254 {
00255    // Control sentence (if debug)
00256 
00257    #ifndef NDEBUG 
00258 
00259    if(i >= numberOfSamples)
00260    {
00261       std::cerr << std::endl
00262                 << "Flood Error: InputTargetDataSet class." << std::endl
00263                 << "Vector<double> getSample(int) method." << std::endl
00264                 << "Index of sample must be less than number of samples." << std::endl
00265                 << std::endl;
00266 
00267       exit(1);   
00268    }
00269 
00270    #endif
00271 
00272    // Get sample
00273 
00274    Vector<double> sample(numberOfInputVariables+numberOfTargetVariables, 0.0);
00275 
00276    // Get input data
00277 
00278    for(int j = 0; j < numberOfInputVariables; j++)
00279    {
00280       sample[j] = inputData[i][j];
00281    }
00282 
00283    // Get target data
00284 
00285    for(int j = 0; j < numberOfTargetVariables; j++)
00286    {
00287       sample[numberOfInputVariables+j] = targetData[i][j];
00288    }
00289 
00290    return(sample);
00291 }

00294 // void setSample(int, Vector<double>)
00295 
00300 
00301 void InputTargetDataSet::setSample(int i, Vector<double> sample)
00302 {
00303    // Control sentence (if debug)
00304 
00305    #ifndef NDEBUG 
00306 
00307    int size = sample.getSize();
00308 
00309    if(i >= numberOfSamples)
00310    {
00311       std::cerr << std::endl
00312                 << "Flood Error: InputTargetDataSet class." << std::endl
00313                 << "void setSample(int, Vector<double>) method." << std::endl
00314                 << "Index of sample must be less than number of samples." << std::endl
00315                 << std::endl;
00316 
00317       exit(1);   
00318    }
00319    else if(size != numberOfInputVariables+numberOfTargetVariables)
00320    {
00321       std::cerr << std::endl
00322                 << "Flood Error: InputTargetDataSet class." << std::endl
00323                 << "void setSample(int, Vector<double>) method." << std::endl
00324                 << "Size of sample must be equal to number of input variables plus number of target variables." 
00325                                 << std::endl
00326                 << std::endl;
00327 
00328       exit(1);   
00329    }
00330 
00331    #endif
00332 
00333    // Set input data
00334 
00335    for(int j = 0; j < numberOfInputVariables; j++)
00336    {
00337       inputData[i][j] = sample[j];
00338    }
00339 
00340    // Set target data
00341 
00342    for(int j = 0; j < numberOfTargetVariables; j++)
00343    {
00344       targetData[i][j] = sample[numberOfInputVariables+j];
00345    }
00346 }

00349 // void addSample(Vector<double>) method
00350 
00357 
00358 void InputTargetDataSet::addSample(Vector<double> sample)
00359 {
00360    // Control sentence (if debug)
00361 
00362    #ifndef NDEBUG 
00363 
00364    int size = sample.getSize();
00365 
00366    if(size != numberOfInputVariables+numberOfTargetVariables)
00367    {
00368       std::cerr << std::endl
00369                 << "Flood Error: InputTargetDataSet class." << std::endl
00370                 << "void addSample(Vector<double>) method." << std::endl
00371                 << "Size of sample must be equal to number of input variables plus number of target variables." 
00372                                 << std::endl
00373                 << std::endl;
00374 
00375       exit(1);   
00376    }
00377 
00378    #endif
00379 
00380    // Add input values from sample
00381 
00382    Matrix<double> newInputData(numberOfSamples+1, numberOfInputVariables, 0.0);
00383 
00384    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfSamples; i++)
00385    {
00386       for(int j = 0; j < numberOfInputVariables; j++)
00387       {
00388          newInputData[i][j] = inputData[i][j];
00389       }
00390    }
00391 
00392    for(int j = 0; j < numberOfInputVariables; j++)
00393    {
00394       newInputData[numberOfSamples][j] = sample[j];
00395    }
00396 
00397    inputData = newInputData;
00398 
00399    // Add target values from sample
00400 
00401    Matrix<double> newTargetData(numberOfSamples+1, numberOfTargetVariables, 0.0);
00402 
00403    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfSamples; i++)
00404    {
00405       for(int j = 0; j < numberOfTargetVariables; j++)
00406       {
00407         newTargetData[i][j] = targetData[i][j];
00408       }
00409    }
00410 
00411    for(int j = 0; j < numberOfTargetVariables; j++)
00412    {
00413       newTargetData[numberOfSamples][j] = sample[numberOfInputVariables+j];
00414    }
00415 
00416    targetData = newTargetData;
00417 
00418    // Set new number of samples
00419 
00420    numberOfSamples++;
00421 }

00424 // void subtractSample(int) method
00425 
00432 
00433 void InputTargetDataSet::subtractSample(int sampleIndex)
00434 {
00435    // Control sentence (if debug)
00436 
00437    #ifndef NDEBUG 
00438 
00439    if(sampleIndex >= numberOfSamples)
00440    {
00441       std::cerr << std::endl
00442                 << "Flood Error: InputTargetDataSet class." << std::endl
00443                 << "void subtractSample(int) method." << std::endl
00444                 << "Index of sample must be less than number of samples." << std::endl
00445                 << std::endl;
00446 
00447       exit(1);   
00448    }
00449 
00450    #endif
00451 
00452    // Subtract input values from sample
00453 
00454    Matrix<double> newInputData(numberOfSamples-1, numberOfInputVariables, 0.0);
00455 
00456    for(int i = 0; i < sampleIndex; i++)
00457    {
00458       for(int j = 0; j < numberOfInputVariables; j++)
00459       {
00460         newInputData[i][j] = inputData[i][j];
00461       }
00462    }
00463 
00464    for(int i = sampleIndex+1; i < numberOfSamples; i++)
00465    {
00466       for(int j = 0; j < numberOfInputVariables; j++)
00467       {
00468         newInputData[i-1][j] = inputData[i][j];
00469       }
00470    }
00471 
00472    inputData = newInputData;
00473 
00474    // Subtract target values from sample
00475 
00476    Matrix<double> newTargetData(numberOfSamples-1, numberOfTargetVariables, 0.0);
00477 
00478    for(int i = 0; i < sampleIndex; i++)
00479    {
00480       for(int j = 0; j < numberOfTargetVariables; j++)
00481       {
00482         newTargetData[i][j] = targetData[i][j];
00483       }
00484    }
00485 
00486    for(int i = sampleIndex+1; i < numberOfSamples; i++)
00487    {
00488       for(int j = 0; j < numberOfTargetVariables; j++)
00489       {
00490         newTargetData[i-1][j] = targetData[i][j];
00491       }
00492    }
00493 
00494    targetData = newTargetData;
00495 
00496    // Set new number of samples
00497 
00498    numberOfSamples--;
00499 }

00811 Vector< Vector<std::string> > InputTargetDataSet::getAllInformation(void)
00812 {
00813    Vector< Vector<std::string> > information(6);
00814 
00815    information[0] = nameOfInputVariables;
00816    information[1] = nameOfTargetVariables;
00817 
00818    information[2] = unitsOfInputVariables;
00819    information[3] = unitsOfTargetVariables;
00820 
00821    information[4] = descriptionOfInputVariables;
00822    information[5] = descriptionOfTargetVariables;
00823 
00824    return(information);
00825 }

00856 
00857 void InputTargetDataSet::setInputTargetDataSet
00858 (int newNumberOfSamples, int newNumberOfInputVariables, int newNumberOfTargetVariables)
00859 {
00860    // Number of samples
00861 
00862    numberOfSamples = newNumberOfSamples;
00863 
00864    // Number of input and target variables
00865 
00866    numberOfInputVariables = newNumberOfInputVariables;   
00867    numberOfTargetVariables = newNumberOfTargetVariables;   
00868 
00869    // Name of input variables
00870 
00871    nameOfInputVariables.resize(numberOfInputVariables);
00872 
00873    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfInputVariables; i++)
00874    {
00875       std::stringstream buffer;
00876 
00877       buffer << "InputVariable" << i;
00878 
00879       nameOfInputVariables[i] = buffer.str();
00880    }
00881 
00882    // Name of target variables
00883 
00884    nameOfTargetVariables.resize(numberOfTargetVariables);
00885 
00886    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfTargetVariables; i++)
00887    {
00888       std::stringstream buffer;
00889 
00890       buffer << "TargetVariable" << i;
00891 
00892       nameOfTargetVariables[i] = buffer.str();
00893    }
00894 
00895    // Units of input variables
00896 
00897    unitsOfInputVariables.resize(numberOfInputVariables);
00898 
00899    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfInputVariables; i++)
00900    {
00901       unitsOfInputVariables[i] = "None";
00902    }
00903 
00904    // Units of target variables
00905 
00906    unitsOfTargetVariables.resize(numberOfTargetVariables);
00907 
00908    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfTargetVariables; i++)
00909    {
00910       unitsOfTargetVariables[i] = "None";
00911    }
00912 
00913    // Description of input variables
00914 
00915    descriptionOfInputVariables.resize(numberOfInputVariables);
00916 
00917    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfInputVariables; i++)
00918    {
00919       descriptionOfInputVariables[i] = "None";
00920    }
00921 
00922    // Description of target variables
00923 
00924    descriptionOfTargetVariables.resize(numberOfTargetVariables);
00925 
00926    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfTargetVariables; i++)
00927    {
00928       descriptionOfTargetVariables[i] = "None";
00929    }
00930 
00931    // Input data 
00932 
00933    inputData.resize(numberOfSamples, numberOfInputVariables);  
00934 
00935    // Target data
00936 
00937    targetData.resize(numberOfSamples, numberOfTargetVariables);  
00938 }

00941 // void setInputData(Matrix<double>) method
00942 
00948 
00949 void InputTargetDataSet::setInputData(Matrix<double> newInputData)
00950 {
00951    // Control sentence (if debug)
00952 
00953    #ifndef NDEBUG 
00954 
00955    if(newInputData.getNumberOfRows() != numberOfSamples)
00956    {
00957       std::cerr << std::endl
00958                 << "Flood Error: InputTargetDataSet class." << std::endl
00959                 << "void setInputData(void) method." << std::endl
00960                 << "Number of rows must be equal to number of samples." << std::endl
00961                 << std::endl;
00962 
00963       exit(1);
00964    }
00965    else if(newInputData.getNumberOfColumns() != numberOfInputVariables)
00966    {
00967       std::cerr << std::endl
00968                 << "Flood Error: InputTargetDataSet class." << std::endl
00969                 << "void setInputData(void) method." << std::endl
00970                 << "Number of columns must be equal to number of input variables." << std::endl
00971                 << std::endl;
00972 
00973       exit(1);
00974    }
00975 
00976    #endif
00977 
00978    // Set input data
00979    
00980    inputData = newInputData;   
00981 }

00984 // void setTargetData(Matrix<double>) method
00985 
00991 
00992 void InputTargetDataSet::setTargetData(Matrix<double> newTargetData)
00993 {
00994    // Control sentence (if debug)
00995 
00996    #ifndef NDEBUG 
00997  
00998    if(newTargetData.getNumberOfRows() != numberOfSamples)
00999    {
01000       std::cout << std::endl
01001                 << "Flood Error: InputTargetDataSet class." << std::endl
01002                 << "void setTargetData(void) method." << std::endl
01003                 << "Number of rows must be equal to number of samples." << std::endl
01004                 << std::endl;
01005 
01006       exit(1);
01007    }
01008    else if(newTargetData.getNumberOfColumns() != numberOfTargetVariables)
01009    {
01010       std::cout << std::endl
01011                 << "Flood Error: InputTargetDataSet class." << std::endl
01012                 << "void setTargetData(void) method." << std::endl
01013                 << "Number of columns must be equal to number of target variables." << std::endl
01014                 << std::endl;
01015 
01016       exit(1);
01017    }
01018 
01019    #endif
01020 
01021    // Set target data
01022 
01023    targetData = newTargetData;   
01024    
01025 }
01026 
01027 
01028 // void setInputAndTargetData(Matrix<double>) method
01029 
01035 
01036 void InputTargetDataSet::setInputAndTargetData(Matrix<double> newInputAndTargetData)
01037 {
01038    // Control sentence (if debug)
01039 
01040    #ifndef NDEBUG 
01041 
01042    int numberOfRows = newInputAndTargetData.getNumberOfRows();
01043    int numberOfColumns = newInputAndTargetData.getNumberOfColumns();
01044 
01045    if(numberOfRows != numberOfSamples)
01046    {
01047       std::cerr << std::endl
01048                 << "Flood Error: InputTargetDataSet class." << std::endl
01049                 << "void setInputAndTargetData(void) method." << std::endl
01050                 << "Number of rows must be equal to number of samples." << std::endl
01051                 << std::endl;
01052 
01053       exit(1);
01054    }
01055    else if(numberOfColumns != numberOfInputVariables + numberOfTargetVariables)
01056    {
01057       std::cerr << std::endl
01058                 << "Flood Error: InputTargetDataSet class." << std::endl
01059                 << "void setInputAndTargetData(void) method." << std::endl
01060                 << "Number of columns must be equal to " << std::endl
01061                 << "number of input variables  plus number of target variables." 
01062                 << std::endl
01063                 << std::endl;
01064 
01065       exit(1);
01066    }
01067    
01068    #endif
01069 
01070    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfSamples; i++)
01071    {
01072       for(int j = 0; j < numberOfInputVariables; j++)
01073       {
01074          inputData[i][j] = newInputAndTargetData[i][j];            
01075       }
01076       for(int k = numberOfInputVariables; k < numberOfInputVariables+numberOfTargetVariables; k++)
01077       {
01078          targetData[i][k-numberOfInputVariables] = newInputAndTargetData[i][k];                          
01079       }
01080    }
01081 }

01505 
01506 // Matrix<double> calculateMeanAndStandardDeviationOfInputData(void) method
01507 
01512 
01513 Matrix<double> InputTargetDataSet::calculateMeanAndStandardDeviationOfInputData(void)
01514 {
01515    // Control sentence (if debug)
01516 
01517    #ifndef NDEBUG 
01518 
01519    if(numberOfSamples == 1)
01520    {
01521       std::cerr << std::endl
01522                 << "Flood Error: InputTargetDataSet class." 
01523                 << "Matrix<double> calculateMeanAndStandardDeviationOfInputData(void) method." << std::endl 
01524                 << "Number of samples must be greater than one." << std::endl 
01525                 << std::endl;
01526 
01527       exit(1);
01528    }
01529 
01530    #endif
01531 
01532    // Calculate mean and standard deviation
01533 
01534    Matrix<double> meanAndStandardDeviationOfInputData(2, numberOfInputVariables, 0.0);
01535 
01536    // Mean of input variables   
01537 
01538    Vector<double> meanOfInputData(numberOfInputVariables, 0.0);
01539 
01540    for(int j = 0; j < numberOfInputVariables; j++)
01541    {
01542       meanOfInputData[j] = 0;
01543 
01544       for(int i = 0; i < numberOfSamples; i++)
01545       {
01546          meanOfInputData[j] = meanOfInputData[j] + inputData[i][j];
01547       }
01548 
01549       meanOfInputData[j] = meanOfInputData[j]/(double)numberOfSamples;
01550    }
01551 
01552    // Standard deviation of input data
01553 
01554    Vector<double> standardDeviationOfInputData(numberOfInputVariables, 0.0);
01555 
01556    for(int j = 0; j < numberOfInputVariables; j++)
01557    {
01558       standardDeviationOfInputData[j] = 0;
01559 
01560       for(int i = 0; i < numberOfSamples; i++)
01561       {
01562          standardDeviationOfInputData[j] += pow(inputData[i][j] - meanOfInputData[j], 2);
01563       }
01564 
01565       standardDeviationOfInputData[j] = sqrt(standardDeviationOfInputData[j]/(numberOfSamples-1.0));
01566    }
01567 
01568    // Mean and standard deviation of input data
01569 
01570    meanAndStandardDeviationOfInputData.setRow(0, meanOfInputData);
01571    meanAndStandardDeviationOfInputData.setRow(1, standardDeviationOfInputData);
01572 
01573    return(meanAndStandardDeviationOfInputData);
01574 }
01575 
01576 
01577 // Matrix<double> calculateMeanAndStandardDeviationOfTargetData(void)
01578 
01583 
01584 Matrix<double> InputTargetDataSet::calculateMeanAndStandardDeviationOfTargetData(void)
01585 {
01586    Matrix<double> meanAndStandardDeviationOfTargetData(2, numberOfTargetVariables, 0.0);
01587 
01588    // Mean of target data
01589 
01590    Vector<double> meanOfTargetData(numberOfTargetVariables, 0.0);
01591 
01592    for(int j = 0; j < numberOfTargetVariables; j++)
01593    {
01594       meanOfTargetData[j] = 0;
01595 
01596       for(int i = 0; i < numberOfSamples; i++)
01597       {
01598          meanOfTargetData[j] += targetData[i][j];
01599       }
01600 
01601       meanOfTargetData[j] = meanOfTargetData[j]/(double)numberOfSamples;
01602     }
01603 
01604    // Standard deviation of target data
01605 
01606    Vector<double> standardDeviationOfTargetData(numberOfTargetVariables, 0.0);
01607 
01608 
01609    for(int j = 0; j < numberOfTargetVariables; j++)
01610    {
01611       standardDeviationOfTargetData[j] = 0;
01612 
01613       for(int i = 0; i < numberOfSamples; i++)
01614       {
01615          standardDeviationOfTargetData[j] += pow(targetData[i][j] - meanOfTargetData[j], 2);
01616       }
01617 
01618       standardDeviationOfTargetData[j] = sqrt(standardDeviationOfTargetData[j]/(numberOfSamples-1.0));
01619    }
01620 
01621    // Mean and standard deviation of target data
01622 
01623    meanAndStandardDeviationOfTargetData.setRow(0, meanOfTargetData);
01624    meanAndStandardDeviationOfTargetData.setRow(1, standardDeviationOfTargetData);
01625 
01626    return(meanAndStandardDeviationOfTargetData);
01627 }
01628 
01629 
01630 // Matrix<double> calculateMinimumAndMaximumOfInputData(void)
01631 
01636 
01637 Matrix<double> InputTargetDataSet::calculateMinimumAndMaximumOfInputData(void)
01638 {
01639    Matrix<double> minimumAndMaximumOfInputData(2, numberOfInputVariables, 0.0);
01640 
01641    Vector<double> minimumOfInputData(numberOfInputVariables,  1.0e69);
01642    Vector<double> maximumOfInputData(numberOfInputVariables, -1.0e69);
01643 
01644    for(int j = 0; j < numberOfInputVariables; j++)
01645    {
01646       for(int i = 0; i < numberOfSamples; i++)
01647       {    
01648          // Minimum of input data
01649 
01650          if(inputData[i][j] < minimumOfInputData[j])
01651          {
01652             minimumOfInputData[j] = inputData[i][j];
01653          }
01654 
01655          // Maximum of input data
01656 
01657          if(inputData[i][j] > maximumOfInputData[j])
01658          {
01659             maximumOfInputData[j] = inputData[i][j];
01660          }
01661       }
01662    }
01663 
01664    // Minimum and maximum of input data
01665 
01666    minimumAndMaximumOfInputData.setRow(0, minimumOfInputData);
01667    minimumAndMaximumOfInputData.setRow(1, maximumOfInputData);
01668 
01669    return(minimumAndMaximumOfInputData);
01670 }
01671 
01672 
01673 // Matrix<double> calculateMinimumAndMaximumOfTargetData(void)
01674 
01679 
01680 Matrix<double> InputTargetDataSet::calculateMinimumAndMaximumOfTargetData(void)
01681 {
01682    Matrix<double> minimumAndMaximumOfTargetData(2, numberOfTargetVariables, 0.0);
01683 
01684    Vector<double> minimumOfTargetData(numberOfTargetVariables,  1.0e69);
01685    Vector<double> maximumOfTargetData(numberOfTargetVariables, -1.0e69);
01686 
01687    for(int j = 0; j < numberOfTargetVariables; j++)
01688    {
01689       for(int i = 0; i < numberOfSamples; i++)
01690       {    
01691          // Minimum of input data
01692 
01693          if(targetData[i][j] < minimumOfTargetData[j])
01694          {
01695             minimumOfTargetData[j] = targetData[i][j];
01696          }
01697 
01698          // Maximum of input data
01699 
01700          if(targetData[i][j] > maximumOfTargetData[j])
01701          {
01702             maximumOfTargetData[j] = targetData[i][j];
01703          }
01704       }
01705    }
01706 
01707    // Minimum and maximum of target data
01708 
01709    minimumAndMaximumOfTargetData.setRow(0, minimumOfTargetData);
01710    minimumAndMaximumOfTargetData.setRow(1, maximumOfTargetData);
01711   
01712    return(minimumAndMaximumOfTargetData);
01713 }
01714 
01715    
01716 // Vector< Vector<double> > calculateAllStatistics(void) method
01717 
01718 Vector< Vector<double> > InputTargetDataSet::calculateAllStatistics(void)
01719 {
01720    Vector< Vector<double> > statistics(8);
01721 
01722    Matrix<double> meanAndStandardDeviationOfInputData = calculateMeanAndStandardDeviationOfInputData();
01723    Matrix<double> meanAndStandardDeviationOfTargetData = calculateMeanAndStandardDeviationOfTargetData();
01724 
01725    Matrix<double> minimumAndMaximumOfInputData = calculateMinimumAndMaximumOfInputData();
01726    Matrix<double> minimumAndMaximumOfTargetData = calculateMinimumAndMaximumOfTargetData();
01727 
01728    // Mean of input data
01729 
01730    statistics[0] = meanAndStandardDeviationOfInputData.getRow(0);
01731 
01732    // Standard deviation of input data 
01733 
01734    statistics[1] = meanAndStandardDeviationOfInputData.getRow(1);
01735 
01736    // Mean of target data
01737 
01738    statistics[2] = meanAndStandardDeviationOfTargetData.getRow(0);
01739 
01740    // Standard deviation of target data
01741 
01742    statistics[3] = meanAndStandardDeviationOfTargetData.getRow(1);
01743 
01744    // Minimum of input data 
01745 
01746    statistics[4] = minimumAndMaximumOfInputData.getRow(0);
01747 
01748    // Maximum of input data
01749 
01750    statistics[5] = minimumAndMaximumOfInputData.getRow(1);
01751 
01752    // Minimum of target data 
01753 
01754    statistics[6] = minimumAndMaximumOfTargetData.getRow(0);
01755 
01756    // Maximum of target data
01757 
01758    statistics[7] = minimumAndMaximumOfTargetData.getRow(1);
01759 
01760    return(statistics);
01761 }
01762 
01763 
01764 // void preprocessMeanAndStandardDeviation(void) method
01765 
01774 
01776 
01777 void InputTargetDataSet::preprocessMeanAndStandardDeviation(void)
01778 {
01779    Matrix<double> newInputData(numberOfSamples, numberOfInputVariables, 0.0);
01780  
01781    Matrix<double> newTargetData(numberOfSamples, numberOfTargetVariables, 0.0);
01782 
01783    // Mean and standard deviation of input data
01784 
01785    Matrix<double> meanAndStandardDeviationOfInputData = calculateMeanAndStandardDeviationOfInputData();
01786 
01787    Vector<double> meanOfInputData = meanAndStandardDeviationOfInputData.getRow(0);
01788    
01789    Vector<double> standardDeviationOfInputData = meanAndStandardDeviationOfInputData.getRow(1);
01790 
01791    // Mean and standard deviation of target data
01792 
01793    Matrix<double> meanAndStandardDeviationOfTargetData = calculateMeanAndStandardDeviationOfTargetData();
01794 
01795    Vector<double> meanOfTargetData = meanAndStandardDeviationOfTargetData.getRow(0);
01796    
01797    Vector<double> standardDeviationOfTargetData = meanAndStandardDeviationOfTargetData.getRow(1);
01798 
01799    // Rescale input data
01800 
01801    for(int j = 0; j < numberOfInputVariables; j++)
01802    {
01803       if(standardDeviationOfInputData[j] < 1e-9)
01804       {
01805          if(display)
01806          {                                          
01807             std::cout << std::endl
01808                       << "Flood Warning: InputTargetDataSet class." << std::endl
01809                       << "void preprocessMeanAndStandardDeviation(void) method." << std::endl
01810                       << "Standard deviation of input variable " << j << " is zero." << std::endl
01811                       << "Those inputs won't be transformed." << std::endl;
01812          }
01813 
01814          for(int i = 0; i < numberOfSamples; i++)
01815          {
01816             newInputData[i][j] = inputData[i][j];
01817          }
01818       }
01819       else
01820       {
01821          for(int i = 0; i < numberOfSamples; i++)
01822          {
01823             newInputData[i][j] = (inputData[i][j] - meanOfInputData[j])/standardDeviationOfInputData[j];
01824          }
01825       }
01826    }
01827 
01828    inputData = newInputData;
01829 
01830 
01831    // Rescale target data
01832 
01833    for(int j = 0; j < numberOfTargetVariables; j++)
01834    {
01835       if(standardDeviationOfTargetData[j] < 1e-9)
01836       {
01837          if(display)
01838          {
01839             std::cout << std::endl
01840                       << "Flood Warning: InputTargetDataSet class." << std::endl
01841                       << "void preprocessMeanAndStandardDeviation(void) method." << std::endl   
01842                       << "Standard deviation of target variable " <<  j << " is zero." << std::endl
01843                       << "Those targets won't be transformed." << std::endl;
01844          }
01845          
01846          for(int i = 0; i < numberOfSamples; i++)
01847          {
01848             newTargetData[i][j] = targetData[i][j];
01849          }
01850       }
01851       else
01852       {
01853          for(int i = 0; i < numberOfSamples; i++)
01854          {
01855             newTargetData[i][j] = (targetData[i][j] - meanOfTargetData[j])/standardDeviationOfTargetData[j];
01856          }
01857       }
01858    }
01859 
01860    targetData = newTargetData;
01861 }
01862

01864 // void preprocessMeanAndStandardDeviation(Matrix<double>, Matrix<double>) method
01865 
01880 
01881 void InputTargetDataSet::preprocessMeanAndStandardDeviation(Matrix<double> meanAndStandardDeviationOfInputData, Matrix<double> meanAndStandardDeviationOfTargetData)
01882 {
01883    Matrix<double> newInputData(numberOfSamples, numberOfInputVariables, 0.0); 
01884    Matrix<double> newTargetData(numberOfSamples, numberOfTargetVariables, 0.0);
01885 
01886    // Mean and standard deviation of input data
01887 
01888    Vector<double> meanOfInputData = meanAndStandardDeviationOfInputData.getRow(0);
01889    
01890    Vector<double> standardDeviationOfInputData = meanAndStandardDeviationOfInputData.getRow(1);
01891 
01892    // Mean and standard deviation of target data
01893 
01894    Vector<double> meanOfTargetData = meanAndStandardDeviationOfTargetData.getRow(0);
01895    
01896    Vector<double> standardDeviationOfTargetData = meanAndStandardDeviationOfTargetData.getRow(1);
01897 
01898    // Rescale input data
01899 
01900    for(int j = 0; j < numberOfInputVariables; j++)
01901    {
01902       if(standardDeviationOfInputData[j] < 1e-9)
01903       {
01904          if(display)
01905          {                                          
01906             std::cout << std::endl
01907                       << "Flood Warning: InputTargetDataSet class." << std::endl
01908                       << "void preprocessMeanAndStandardDeviation(void) method." << std::endl
01909                       << "Standard deviation of input variable " << j << " is zero." << std::endl
01910                       << "Those inputs won't be transformed."
01911                       << std::endl;
01912          }
01913 
01914          for(int i = 0; i < numberOfSamples; i++)
01915          {
01916             newInputData[i][j] = inputData[i][j];
01917          }
01918       }
01919       else
01920       {
01921          for(int i = 0; i < numberOfSamples; i++)
01922          {
01923             newInputData[i][j] = (inputData[i][j] - meanOfInputData[j])/standardDeviationOfInputData[j];
01924          }
01925       }
01926    }
01927 
01928    inputData = newInputData;
01929 
01930    // Rescale target data
01931 
01932    for(int j = 0; j < numberOfTargetVariables; j++)
01933    {
01934       if(standardDeviationOfTargetData[j] < 1e-9)
01935       {
01936          if(display)
01937          {
01938             std::cout << std::endl
01939                       << "Flood Warning: InputTargetDataSet class." << std::endl
01940                       << "void preprocessMeanAndStandardDeviation(Matrix<double>, Matrix<double>) method." 
01941                       << std::endl   
01942                       << "Standard deviation of target variable " <<  j << " is zero." << std::endl
01943                       << "Those targets won't be transformed."
01944                       << std::endl;
01945          }
01946          
01947          for(int i = 0; i < numberOfSamples; i++)
01948          {
01949             newTargetData[i][j] = targetData[i][j];
01950          }
01951       }
01952       else
01953       {
01954          for(int i = 0; i < numberOfSamples; i++)
01955          {
01956             newTargetData[i][j] = (targetData[i][j] - meanOfTargetData[j])/standardDeviationOfTargetData[j];
01957          }
01958       }
01959    }
01960 
01961    targetData = newTargetData;     
01962 }

01964 
01965 // void preprocessMinimumAndMaximum(void) method
01966 
01977 
01978 void InputTargetDataSet::preprocessMinimumAndMaximum(void)
01979 {
01980    Matrix<double> newInputData(numberOfSamples, numberOfInputVariables, 0.0);
01981    Matrix<double> newTargetData(numberOfSamples, numberOfTargetVariables, 0.0);
01982 
01983    // Mean and standard deviation of input data
01984 
01985    Matrix<double> minimumAndMaximumOfInputData 
01986    = calculateMinimumAndMaximumOfInputData();
01987 
01988    Vector<double> minimumOfInputData = minimumAndMaximumOfInputData.getRow(0);
01989    Vector<double> maximumOfInputData = minimumAndMaximumOfInputData.getRow(1);
01990 
01991    // Minimum and maximum of target data
01992 
01993    Matrix<double> minimumAndMaximumOfTargetData
01994    = calculateMinimumAndMaximumOfTargetData();
01995 
01996    Vector<double> minimumOfTargetData = minimumAndMaximumOfTargetData.getRow(0);
01997    Vector<double> maximumOfTargetData = minimumAndMaximumOfTargetData.getRow(1);
01998 
01999    // Rescale input data
02000 
02001    for(int j = 0; j < numberOfInputVariables; j++)
02002    {
02003       if(maximumOfInputData[j] - minimumOfInputData[j] < 1e-9)
02004       {
02005          if(display)
02006          {
02007             std::cout << std::endl
02008                       << "Flood Warning: InputTargetDataSet class." << std::endl
02009                       << "void preprocessMinimumAndMaximum(void) method." << std::endl
02010                       << "Minimum and maximum values of input variable " << j << " are equal." << std::endl
02011                       << "Those inputs won't be transformed." << std::endl;
02012          }
02013 
02014          for(int i = 0; i < numberOfSamples; i++)
02015          {
02016             newInputData[i][j] = inputData[i][j];
02017          }
02018       }
02019       else
02020       {
02021          for(int i = 0; i < numberOfSamples; i++)
02022          {
02023             newInputData[i][j] 
02024             = 2.0*(inputData[i][j] - minimumOfInputData[j])/(maximumOfInputData[j]-minimumOfInputData[j])-1.0;
02025          }
02026       }
02027    }
02028 
02029    inputData = newInputData;
02030 
02031 
02032    // Rescale target data
02033 
02034    for(int j = 0; j < numberOfTargetVariables; j++)
02035    {
02036       if(maximumOfTargetData[j] - minimumOfTargetData[j] < 1e-9)
02037       {
02038          if(display)
02039          {
02040             std::cout << std::endl
02041                       << "Flood Warning: InputTargetDataSet class." << std::endl
02042                       << "void preprocessMinimumAndMaximum(void) method." << std::endl   
02043                       << "Minimum and maximum values of target variable " << j << " are equal." << std::endl
02044                       << "Those targets won't be transformed." << std::endl;
02045          }
02046          
02047          for(int i = 0; i < numberOfSamples; i++)
02048          {
02049             newTargetData[i][j] = targetData[i][j];
02050          }
02051       }
02052       else
02053       {
02054          for(int i = 0; i < numberOfSamples; i++)
02055          {
02056             newTargetData[i][j] = 2.0*(targetData[i][j] - minimumOfTargetData[j])
02057             /(maximumOfTargetData[j]-minimumOfTargetData[j]) - 1.0;
02058          }
02059       }
02060    }
02061 
02062    targetData = newTargetData;
02063    
02064 }
02065

02168 
02169 // void postprocessMeanAndStandardDeviation(Matrix<double>, Matrix<double>) method 
02170 
02183 
02184 void InputTargetDataSet::postprocessMeanAndStandardDeviation(Matrix<double> meanAndStandardDeviationOfInputData, Matrix<double> meanAndStandardDeviationOfTargetData)
02185 {
02186    Matrix<double> newInputData(numberOfSamples, numberOfInputVariables, 0.0);
02187    Matrix<double> newTargetData(numberOfSamples, numberOfTargetVariables, 0.0);
02188 
02189    // Mean and standard deviation of input data
02190 
02191    Vector<double> meanOfInputData 
02192    = meanAndStandardDeviationOfInputData.getRow(0);
02193 
02194    Vector<double> standardDeviationOfInputData 
02195    = meanAndStandardDeviationOfInputData.getRow(1);
02196 
02197    // Mean and standard deviation of target data
02198 
02199    Vector<double> meanOfTargetData 
02200    = meanAndStandardDeviationOfTargetData.getRow(0);
02201    
02202    Vector<double> standardDeviationOfTargetData 
02203    = meanAndStandardDeviationOfTargetData.getRow(1);
02204 
02205    // Postprocess input data
02206 
02207    for(int j = 0; j < numberOfInputVariables; j++)
02208    {
02209       if(standardDeviationOfInputData[j] < 1e-9)
02210       {
02211          if(display)
02212          {                                          
02213             std::cout << std::endl
02214                       << "Flood Warning: InputTargetDataSet class." << std::endl
02215                       << "void postprocessMeanAndStandardDeviation(Matrix<double>, Matrix<double>) method." << std::endl
02216                  << "Standard deviation of input variable " << j << " is zero." << std::endl
02217                       << "Those inputs won't be transformed."
02218                       << std::endl;
02219          }
02220 
02221          for(int i = 0; i < numberOfSamples; i++)
02222          {
02223             newInputData[i][j] = inputData[i][j];
02224          }
02225       }
02226       else
02227       {
02228          for(int i = 0; i < numberOfSamples; i++)
02229          {
02230             newInputData[i][j] = inputData[i][j]*standardDeviationOfInputData[j] 
02231             + meanOfInputData[j];
02232          }
02233       }
02234    }
02235 
02236    inputData = newInputData;
02237 
02238 
02239    // Rescale target data
02240 
02241    for(int j = 0; j < numberOfTargetVariables; j++)
02242    {
02243       if(standardDeviationOfTargetData[j] < 1e-9)
02244       {
02245          if(display)
02246          {
02247             std::cout << std::endl
02248                       << "Flood Warning: InputTargetDataSet class." << std::endl
02249                       << "void postprocessMeanAndStandardDeviation(Matrix<double>, Matrix<double>) method." << std::endl   
02250                  << "Standard deviation of target variable " <<  j << " is zero." << std::endl
02251                       << "Those targets won't be transformed."
02252                       << std::endl;
02253          }
02254          
02255          for(int i = 0; i < numberOfSamples; i++)
02256          {
02257             newTargetData[i][j] = targetData[i][j];
02258          }
02259       }
02260       else
02261       {
02262          for(int i = 0; i < numberOfSamples; i++)
02263          {
02264             newTargetData[i][j] = targetData[i][j]*standardDeviationOfTargetData[j] 
02265             + meanOfTargetData[j];
02266          }
02267       }
02268    }
02269 
02270    targetData = newTargetData;
02271 }
02272 
02273 
02274 // void postprocessMinimumAndMaximum(Matrix<double>, Matrix<double>) method
02275 
02288 
02289 void InputTargetDataSet::postprocessMinimumAndMaximum(Matrix<double> minimumAndMaximumOfInputData, Matrix<double> minimumAndMaximumOfTargetData) 
02290 {
02291    Matrix<double> newInputData(numberOfSamples, numberOfInputVariables, 0.0);
02292    Matrix<double> newTargetData(numberOfSamples, numberOfTargetVariables, 0.0);
02293 
02294    // Minimum and maximum of input data
02295 
02296    Vector<double> minimumOfInputData 
02297    = minimumAndMaximumOfInputData.getRow(0);
02298 
02299    Vector<double> maximumOfInputData 
02300    = minimumAndMaximumOfInputData.getRow(1);
02301 
02302    // Minimum and maximum of target data
02303 
02304    Vector<double> minimumOfTargetData = minimumAndMaximumOfTargetData.getRow(0);
02305    Vector<double> maximumOfTargetData = minimumAndMaximumOfTargetData.getRow(1);
02306 
02307    // Postprocess input data
02308 
02309    for(int j = 0; j < numberOfInputVariables; j++)
02310    {
02311       if(maximumOfInputData[j] - minimumOfInputData[j] < 1e-9)
02312       {
02313          if(display)
02314          {
02315             std::cout << std::endl
02316                       << "Flood Warning: InputTargetDataSet class." << std::endl
02317                       << "void postprocessMinimumAndMaximum(Matrix<double>, Matrix<double>) method." << std::endl
02318                  << "Minimum and maximum values of input variable " << j << " are equal." << std::endl
02319                       << "Those inputs won't be transformed."
02320                       << std::endl;
02321          }
02322 
02323          for(int i = 0; i < numberOfSamples; i++)
02324          {
02325             newInputData[i][j] = inputData[i][j];
02326          }
02327       }
02328       else
02329       {
02330          for(int i = 0; i < numberOfSamples; i++)
02331          {
02332          newInputData[i][j] = 0.5*(inputData[i][j] + 1.0)*(maximumOfInputData[j]-minimumOfInputData[j]) 
02333             + minimumOfInputData[j]; 
02334          }
02335       }
02336    }
02337 
02338    inputData = newInputData;
02339 
02340 
02341    // Postprocess target data
02342 
02343    for(int j = 0; j < numberOfTargetVariables; j++)
02344    {
02345       if(maximumOfTargetData[j] - minimumOfTargetData[j] < 1e-9)
02346       {
02347          if(display)
02348          {
02349             std::cout << std::endl
02350                       << "Flood Warning: InputTargetDataSet class." << std::endl
02351                       << "void postprocessMinimumAndMaximum(Matrix<double>, Matrix<double>) method." << std::endl   
02352                  << "Minimum and maximum values of target variable " << j << " are equal." << std::endl
02353                       << "Those targets won't be transformed."
02354                       << std::endl;
02355          }
02356          
02357          for(int i = 0; i < numberOfSamples; i++)
02358          {
02359             newTargetData[i][j] = targetData[i][j];
02360          }
02361       }
02362       else
02363       {
02364          for(int i = 0; i < numberOfSamples; i++)
02365          {
02366          newTargetData[i][j] = 0.5*(targetData[i][j] + 1.0)*(maximumOfTargetData[j]-minimumOfTargetData[j]) 
02367             + minimumOfTargetData[j]; 
02368          }
02369       }
02370    }
02371 
02372    targetData = newTargetData;
02373 }

02376 // void save(char*) method
02377 
02395 
02396 void InputTargetDataSet::save(char* filename)
02397 {
02398    std::fstream file; 
02399 
02400    file.open(filename, std::ios::out);
02401 
02402    if(!file.is_open())
02403    {
02404       std::cerr << std::endl
02405                 << "Flood Error: InputTargetDataSet class." << std::endl 
02406                 << "void save(char*) method." << std::endl
02407                 << "Cannot open input-target data set file."  << std::endl
02408                 << std::endl;
02409 
02410       exit(1);
02411    }
02412    else
02413    {
02414       if(display)
02415       {
02416          std::cout << std::endl
02417                    << "Saving input-target data set to file..." << std::endl;
02418       }
02419    }
02420   
02421    // Write file header
02422 
02423    file << "% Flood Neural Network. Input-Target Data Set Object." << std::endl;
02424 
02425    // Write number of samples and number of input and target variables
02426 
02427    file << "NumberOfSamples:" << std::endl
02428         << numberOfSamples << std::endl
02429         << "NumberOfInputVariables:" << std::endl
02430         << numberOfInputVariables << std::endl
02431         << "NumberOfTargetVariables:" << std::endl
02432         << numberOfTargetVariables << std::endl;
02433 
02434    // Write name of input variables
02435 
02436    file << "NameOfInputVariables:" << std::endl
02437        << nameOfInputVariables << std::endl;
02438  
02439    // Write name of target variables
02440 
02441    file << "NameOfTargetVariables:" << std::endl
02442         << nameOfTargetVariables << std::endl;
02443 
02444    // Write units of input variables
02445 
02446    file << "UnitsOfInputVariables:" << std::endl
02447        << unitsOfInputVariables << std::endl;
02448  
02449    // Write units of target variables
02450 
02451    file << "UnitsOfTargetVariables:" << std::endl
02452         << unitsOfTargetVariables << std::endl;
02453 
02454    // Write description of input variables
02455 
02456    file << "DescriptionOfInputVariables:" << std::endl
02457        << descriptionOfInputVariables << std::endl;
02458  
02459    // Write description of target variables
02460 
02461    file << "DescriptionOfTargetVariables:" << std::endl
02462         << descriptionOfTargetVariables << std::endl;
02463 
02464    // Write input-target data 
02465 
02466    Matrix<double> inputAndTargetData = getInputAndTargetData();
02467 
02468    file << "InputAndTargetData:" << std::endl
02469         << inputAndTargetData;
02470 
02471    file.close();
02472 }

02474 
02475 // void load(char*) method
02476 
02498 
02499 void InputTargetDataSet::load(char* filename)
02500 {
02501    std::fstream file; 
02502 
02503    file.open(filename, std::ios::in);
02504 
02505    if(!file.is_open())
02506    {
02507       std::cerr << std::endl 
02508                 << "Flood Error: InputTargetDataSet class." << std::endl
02509                 << "void load(char*) method." << std::endl
02510                 << "Cannot open input-target data set file."  << std::endl
02511                 << std::endl;
02512 
02513       exit(1);
02514    }
02515    else
02516    {
02517       if(display)
02518       {
02519          std::cout << std::endl
02520                    << "Loading input-target data set from file..." << std::endl;
02521       }
02522    }
02523 
02524    std::string word;
02525 
02526    while(word != "NumberOfSamples:")
02527    {
02528       file >> word;
02529    }
02530 
02531    file >> numberOfSamples;
02532 
02533    // Number of input variables
02534 
02535    file >> word;
02536    
02537    if(word != "NumberOfInputVariables:")
02538    {
02539       std::cerr << std::endl 
02540                 << "Flood Error: InputTargetDataSet class." << std::endl
02541                 << "void load(char*) method." << std::endl
02542                 << "Unknown file format."  << std::endl
02543                 << std::endl;
02544 
02545       exit(1);   
02546    }
02547 
02548    file >> numberOfInputVariables;
02549 
02550    // Number of target variables 
02551 
02552    file >> word;
02553 
02554    if(word != "NumberOfTargetVariables:")
02555    {
02556       std::cerr << std::endl 
02557                 << "Flood Error: InputTargetDataSet class." << std::endl
02558                 << "void load(char*) method." << std::endl
02559                 << "Unknown file format."  << std::endl
02560                 << std::endl;
02561 
02562       exit(1);   
02563    }
02564 
02565    file >> numberOfTargetVariables;
02566 
02567    // Set input-target data set
02568 
02569    setInputTargetDataSet(numberOfSamples, numberOfInputVariables, numberOfTargetVariables);
02570 
02571    // Name of input variables
02572 
02573    file >> word;
02574 
02575    if(word != "NameOfInputVariables:")
02576    {
02577       std::cerr << std::endl 
02578                 << "Flood Error: InputTargetDataSet class." << std::endl
02579                 << "void load(char*) method." << std::endl
02580                 << "Unknown file format."  << std::endl
02581                 << std::endl;
02582 
02583       exit(1);   
02584    }
02585 
02586    file >> nameOfInputVariables;
02587 
02588    // Name of target variables
02589 
02590    file >> word;
02591 
02592    if(word != "NameOfTargetVariables:")
02593    {
02594       std::cerr << std::endl 
02595                 << "Flood Error: InputTargetDataSet class." << std::endl
02596                 << "void load(char*) method." << std::endl
02597                 << "Unknown file format."  << std::endl
02598                 << std::endl;
02599 
02600       exit(1);   
02601    }
02602 
02603    file >> nameOfTargetVariables;
02604 
02605    // Units of input variables
02606 
02607    file >> word;
02608 
02609    if(word != "UnitsOfInputVariables:")
02610    {
02611       std::cerr << std::endl 
02612                 << "Flood Error: InputTargetDataSet class." << std::endl
02613                 << "void load(char*) method." << std::endl
02614                 << "Unknown file format."  << std::endl
02615                 << std::endl;
02616 
02617       exit(1);   
02618    }
02619 
02620    file >> unitsOfInputVariables;
02621 
02622    // Units of target variables
02623 
02624    file >> word;
02625 
02626    if(word != "UnitsOfTargetVariables:")
02627    {
02628       std::cerr << std::endl 
02629                 << "Flood Error: InputTargetDataSet class." << std::endl
02630                 << "void load(char*) method." << std::endl
02631                 << "Unknown file format."  << std::endl
02632                 << std::endl;
02633 
02634       exit(1);   
02635    }
02636 
02637    file >> unitsOfTargetVariables;
02638 
02639    // Description of input variables
02640 
02641    file >> word;
02642 
02643    if(word != "DescriptionOfInputVariables:")
02644    {
02645       std::cerr << std::endl 
02646                 << "Flood Error: InputTargetDataSet class." << std::endl
02647                 << "void load(char*) method." << std::endl
02648                 << "Unknown file format."  << std::endl
02649                 << std::endl;
02650 
02651       exit(1);   
02652    }
02653 
02654    file >> descriptionOfInputVariables;
02655 
02656    // Description of target variables
02657 
02658    file >> word;
02659 
02660    if(word != "DescriptionOfTargetVariables:")
02661    {
02662       std::cerr << std::endl 
02663                 << "Flood Error: InputTargetDataSet class." << std::endl
02664                 << "void load(char*) method." << std::endl
02665                 << "Unknown file format."  << std::endl
02666                 << std::endl;
02667 
02668       exit(1);   
02669    }
02670 
02671    file >> descriptionOfTargetVariables;
02672 
02673    // Input-target data 
02674 
02675    file >> word;
02676 
02677    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfSamples; i++) 
02678    {
02679       for(int j = 0; j < numberOfInputVariables; j++)
02680       {
02681          file >> inputData[i][j];
02682       }
02683 
02684       for(int j = numberOfInputVariables; j < numberOfInputVariables + numberOfTargetVariables; j++)
02685       {
02686          file >> targetData[i][j-numberOfInputVariables];
02687       }
02688    }
02689  
02690    file.close(); 
02691 }

02776 {

02780

02788

02796                    << "Saving statistics to data file..." << std::endl;

02812

02814

02816         << statistics[0] << std::endl
02817         << "Standard deviation of input data:" << std::endl
02818         << statistics[1] << std::endl 
02819         << "Mean of target data:"<< std::endl
02820         << statistics[2] << std::endl
02821         << "Standard deviation of target data:" << std::endl
02822         << statistics[3] << std::endl
02823         << "Minimum of input data:" << std::endl 
02824         << statistics[4] << std::endl
02825         << "Maximum of input data:" << std::endl
02826         << statistics[5] << std::endl
02827         << "Minimum of target data:" << std::endl
02828         << statistics[6]  << std::endl
02829         << "Maximum of target data:"  << std::endl
02830         << statistics[7] << std::endl;
02831 
02832    // Close file
02833 
02834    file.close();
02835 }

02865 
02866 // Vector<InputTargetDataSet> splitTrainingValidationAndTesting(double, double, double) method
02867 
02871 
02872 Vector<InputTargetDataSet> InputTargetDataSet::splitTrainingValidationAndTesting(double percentageOfTrainingSamples, 
02873 double percentageOfValidationSamples, double percentageOfTestingSamples)
02874 {
02875    // Control sentence 
02876 
02877    if(percentageOfTrainingSamples + percentageOfValidationSamples + percentageOfTestingSamples != 100.0)
02878    {
02879       std::cerr << std::endl
02880                 << "Flood Error: InputTargetDataSet class." << std::endl 
02881                 << "void splitTrainingValidationAndTesting(double, double, double) method." << std::endl
02882                 << "Sum of training, validation and testing percentages is not 100."  << std::endl
02883                 << std::endl;
02884 
02885       exit(1);
02886    }
02887 
02888 
02889    Vector<InputTargetDataSet> trainingValidationAndTesting(3);
02890 
02891    // Get number of samples for training, validation and testing
02892 
02893    int numberOfTestingSamples = (int)(percentageOfTestingSamples*numberOfSamples/100.0);
02894    int numberOfValidationSamples = (int)(percentageOfValidationSamples*numberOfSamples/100.0);
02895    int numberOfTrainingSamples = numberOfSamples - numberOfValidationSamples - numberOfTestingSamples;
02896    
02897    // Construct training, validation and testing data set objects
02898 
02899    InputTargetDataSet testingDataSet(numberOfTestingSamples, numberOfInputVariables, numberOfTargetVariables);
02900    InputTargetDataSet validationDataSet(numberOfValidationSamples, numberOfInputVariables, numberOfTargetVariables);
02901    InputTargetDataSet trainingDataSet(numberOfTrainingSamples, numberOfInputVariables, numberOfTargetVariables);
02902 
02903    Vector<double> sample(numberOfInputVariables+numberOfTargetVariables, 0.0); 
02904 
02905    double random = 0.0;
02906    int subset = 0;
02907 
02908    int countTrainingSamples = 0;
02909    int countValidationSamples = 0;
02910    int countTestingSamples = 0;
02911 
02912    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfSamples; i++)
02913    {
02914       random = rand()/(RAND_MAX+1.0);
02915       subset = (int)(3*random);
02916 
02917       sample = getSample(i); 
02918       
02919       if(subset == 0)  
02920       {
02921          if(countTrainingSamples != numberOfTrainingSamples)
02922          {
02923             trainingDataSet.setSample(countTrainingSamples, sample);
02924             countTrainingSamples++;   
02925          }
02926          else if(countValidationSamples != numberOfValidationSamples)
02927          {
02928             validationDataSet.setSample(countValidationSamples, sample);
02929             countValidationSamples++;   
02930          }
02931          else if(countTestingSamples != numberOfTestingSamples)
02932          {
02933             testingDataSet.setSample(countTestingSamples, sample);
02934             countTestingSamples++;   
02935          }
02936       }
02937       else if(subset == 1) 
02938       {
02939          if(countValidationSamples != numberOfValidationSamples)
02940          {
02941             validationDataSet.setSample(countValidationSamples, sample);
02942             countValidationSamples++;   
02943          }
02944          else if(countTestingSamples != numberOfTestingSamples)
02945          {
02946             testingDataSet.setSample(countTestingSamples, sample);
02947             countTestingSamples++;   
02948          }
02949          else if(countTrainingSamples != numberOfTrainingSamples)
02950          {
02951             trainingDataSet.setSample(countTrainingSamples, sample);
02952             countTrainingSamples++;   
02953          }
02954       }
02955       else if(subset == 2) 
02956       {
02957          if(countTestingSamples != numberOfTestingSamples)
02958          {
02959             testingDataSet.setSample(countTestingSamples, sample);
02960             countTestingSamples++;   
02961 
02962          }
02963          else if(countTrainingSamples != numberOfTrainingSamples)
02964          {
02965             trainingDataSet.setSample(countTrainingSamples, sample);
02966             countTrainingSamples++;   
02967          }
02968          else if(countValidationSamples != numberOfValidationSamples)
02969          {
02970             validationDataSet.setSample(countValidationSamples, sample);
02971             countValidationSamples++;   
02972          }
02973       }
02974       else
02975       {
02976          std::cerr << std::endl
02977                    << "Flood Error: InputTargetDataSet class." << std::endl 
02978                    << "void splitTrainingValidationAndTesting(double, double, double) method." << std::endl
02979                    << "Subset is neiter 0, 1 or 2." << std::endl
02980                    << std::endl;
02981 
02982          exit(1);
02983       }
02984    }
02985 
02986    // Control sentence
02987  
02988    if(countTrainingSamples != numberOfTrainingSamples 
02989    || countValidationSamples != numberOfValidationSamples 
02990    || countTestingSamples != numberOfTestingSamples)
02991    {
02992       std::cerr << std::endl
02993                 << "Flood Error: InputTargetDataSet class." << std::endl 
02994                 << "void splitTrainingValidationAndTesting(double, double, double) method." << std::endl
02995                 << "Count training validation and testing samples is wrong." << std::endl
02996                 << std::endl;
02997 
02998       exit(1);
02999    }
03000 
03001    trainingValidationAndTesting[0] = trainingDataSet;
03002    trainingValidationAndTesting[1] = validationDataSet;
03003    trainingValidationAndTesting[2] = testingDataSet;
03004 
03005    return(trainingValidationAndTesting);
03006 }
03007 
03008 
03009 Vector<InputTargetDataSet> InputTargetDataSet::split(double percentage0, double percentage1)
03010 {
03011    // Control sentence 
03012 
03013    if(percentage0 + percentage1 != 100.0)
03014    {
03015       std::cerr << std::endl
03016                 << "Flood Error: InputTargetDataSet class." << std::endl 
03017                 << "void split(double, double) method." << std::endl
03018                 << "Sum of percentages is not 100."  << std::endl
03019                 << std::endl;
03020 
03021       exit(1);
03022    }
03023 
03024    Vector<InputTargetDataSet> inputTargetDataSetVector(2);
03025 
03026    // Get number of samples for training, validation and testing
03027 
03028    int numberOfSamples0 = (int)(percentage0*numberOfSamples/100.0);
03029    int numberOfSamples1 = numberOfSamples - numberOfSamples0;
03030    
03031    // Construct training, validation and testing data set objects
03032 
03033    inputTargetDataSetVector[0].setInputTargetDataSet(numberOfSamples0, numberOfInputVariables, numberOfTargetVariables);
03034    inputTargetDataSetVector[1].setInputTargetDataSet(numberOfSamples1, numberOfInputVariables, numberOfTargetVariables);
03035 
03036    Vector<double> sample(numberOfInputVariables+numberOfTargetVariables, 0.0); 
03037 
03038    double random = 0.0;
03039    int subset = 0;
03040 
03041    int countSamples0 = 0;
03042    int countSamples1 = 0;
03043 
03044    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfSamples; i++)
03045    {
03046       random = rand()/(RAND_MAX+1.0);
03047       subset = (int)(2*random);
03048 
03049       sample = getSample(i); 
03050       
03051       if(subset == 0)  
03052       {
03053          if(countSamples0 != numberOfSamples0)
03054          {
03055             inputTargetDataSetVector[0].setSample(countSamples0, sample);
03056             countSamples0++;   
03057          }
03058          else if(countSamples1 != numberOfSamples1)
03059          {
03060             inputTargetDataSetVector[1].setSample(countSamples1, sample);
03061             countSamples1++;   
03062          }
03063       }
03064       else if(subset == 1) 
03065       {
03066          if(countSamples1 != numberOfSamples1)
03067          {
03068             inputTargetDataSetVector[1].setSample(countSamples1, sample);
03069             countSamples1++;   
03070          }
03071          else if(countSamples0 != numberOfSamples0)
03072          {
03073             inputTargetDataSetVector[0].setSample(countSamples0, sample);
03074             countSamples0++;   
03075          }
03076       }
03077       else
03078       {
03079          std::cerr << std::endl
03080                    << "Flood Error: InputTargetDataSet class." << std::endl 
03081                    << "void splitTrainingValidationAndTesting(double, double, double) method." << std::endl
03082                    << "Subset is neiter 0 or 1." << std::endl
03083                    << std::endl;
03084 
03085          exit(1);
03086       }
03087    }
03088 
03089    // Control sentence
03090  
03091    if(countSamples0 != numberOfSamples0 || countSamples1 != numberOfSamples1)
03092    {
03093       std::cerr << std::endl
03094                 << "Flood Error: InputTargetDataSet class." << std::endl 
03095                 << "void split(double, double) method." << std::endl
03096                 << "Count samples is wrong." << std::endl
03097                 << std::endl;
03098 
03099       exit(1);
03100    }
03101 
03102    return(inputTargetDataSetVector);
03103 }
